name: Quiz Anak Sholeh
description: This 2D game has a genre of Islamic education. The main purpose of this game is to teach children to easily learn about the religion of Islam. This is made especially for (children) where players can play several types of games in the game which later there will be several levels. Each level is certainly different discussion. When the player can pass the level that is already available then at the end of the game the player can see the player's piety level score. Due to the Islamic introduction educational game, the game is not timed. The platform in this game is a Mobile Games made to be played on a mobile phone so that it is easily accessed by children.
